name: Molecular Hydrogen (H2)
description: Molecular hydrogen gas (H2) dissolved in water or inhaled. Selectively neutralizes hydroxyl radical (•OH) — the most cytotoxic ROS — without affecting beneficial signaling ROS. Small size allows penetration of all cellular compartments including mitochondria and nucleus.

dosage.notes: Dissolve H2 tablet in water (500ml), drink quickly (H2 escapes). Or use hydrogen water generator. 1000+ published studies. Extremely safe — no known toxic dose.

keyFindings: Improved metabolic syndrome markers in double-blind RCT
Selective antioxidant — only targets harmful •OH radical, preserves beneficial H2O2 and NO signaling
